{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient is suffering from browning of teeth, wearing of enamel but not cavitatory. OPG shows obliteration of pulp with narrowing of canal & deposition of secondary dentin. The patient has a family history of the same disease affecting 2 out of her 4 brothers. Based on these symptoms and the imaging findings, the most likely diagnosis is Dentinogenesis imperfecta.", "answer_choice": "B"}
